sentences.en: Being in love must have addled your brain.
sentences.cn: 坠入爱河必已使你神魂颠倒。

sentences.en: But the very notion has upset the darkies till they're right addled.
sentences.cn: 可是,光这种想法本身就把黑人搞得简直昏昏然了.

sentences.en: He has addled his head with reading and writing all day long.
sentences.cn: 他整天读书写字,头都昏了.

sentences.en: HIS memories are addled, but the young member of Cocaine Anonymous can just about recall his formal drug education.
sentences.cn: 他的记忆已经腐坏 但这位匿名的年轻可卡因吸食者还能勉强回忆起他受过的正规毒品宣传.

sentences.en: I suppose the shock had addled his poor old brain.
sentences.cn: 我估摸这个打击已经把他那可怜的脑袋瓜搞糊涂了。

sentences.en: She wore a sweet and slightly addled expression.
sentences.cn: 她一脸小迷糊的可爱样儿。

sentences.en: You're talking like an addled romantic.
sentences.cn: 你说话像个糊里糊涂耽于幻想的人。

trans.tran_cn: （头脑）糊涂的，愚蠢的，（指蛋类）变坏
使糊涂( addle的过去式和过去分词 )，使混乱，使腐臭，使变质
